content: **knitted socks with rib for baby and children in drops babymerino** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-035-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years to fit foot length 10-11-12 14-16 cm / 4 -4 -4¾ 5½ -6¼ **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio color no 22 light gray 50 g for all sizes drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 - or size needed to get correct gauge
